p: Then, in the early 2016, a transition from genotype D8 to B3 was observed in Sicily. The introduction of this latter genotype chronologically correlated to a measles case imported from a Northern region of Italy, where the circulation of this viral variant began a couple of years before [ 11], and that was identical to a B3 variant spread from Lombardy to Emilia Romagna among the Roma/Sinti population and healthcare workers [ 28].
